items.title: Found Footage Horror ‘Project Butterfly: Flatwoods’ Coming Halloween Night 2025!

• The further the students dig, the more they uncover the terrifying truths of this bunker

items.title: Jane Goodall, legendary primatologist, has died at age 91
bullets: • Jane Goodall, a scientist whose studies of wild chimpanzees made her a household name, has died at the age of 91
• Her groundbreaking discoveries showed just how much chimps are like humans
• "They kiss, embrace, hold hands, pat one another on the back," Goodall said

• Trump administration is forging ahead with plans to erect a 27-mile section of the border wall here

items.title: Why ultra-processed foods aren’t the real villain behind overeating
bullets: • Researchers found that overeating is driven more by what people believe about food than by its actual ingredients or level of processing
• Foods perceived as fatty, sweet, or highly processed were more likely to trigger indulgence
• Surprisingly, the “ultra-processed” label explained almost none of the difference in overeating behavior
• The findings suggest that perception and psychology may be more important than packaging or processing

items.title: What to expect as Syria holds first parliamentary elections since Assad's ouster

• Most of the seats will be voted on by electoral colleges in each district
